synopsis.text:
Tatsunagi Takuto extends an invitation to Aichi and Kai for an exclusive tournament, 'Messiah Scramble', in a dream, with the first prize being the powerful 'Messiah' card - a savior's name whispered in dreams. This hybrid anime/live-action movie, slated for Fall 2014, unfolds after the events of Link Joker-hen, as Aichi and Kai join forces to combat an imminent threat to their recently restored peace.

Meanwhile, the world witnesses a surge of Vanguard card units vanishing. Aichi, entrusted with the hopes and aspirations to save Planet Cray from impending doom, prepares for the harshest battle yet. The movie serves as a prequel to Legion Mate-hen, ultimately leading to Aichi's disappearance and a confrontation with Ibuki Kouji. This intense narrative promises a gripping adventure for fans of the series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
